column3: Institute of Psychiatry, Psychology and Neuroscience
column5: Our Neuroscience MSc course will provide you with multidisciplinary training in a range of neuroscience topics, particularly those relevant to psychiatry, psychology and neurology. It seeks to equip graduates from a wide range of backgrounds for the next stage of their career, which may be either further full-time study in a neuroscience-related academic research environment, or employment in an academic, clinical or pharmaceutical organisation.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: One year FT. Two years PT.
